body_html: @apaszke, and also I don't think F.relu and CUDA time would be problems, because they can always be resolved technically (actually we already have some solutions). And the above layer-by-layer profiling tool we list above is just a quick prototype to demo basic functionalities. We can improve it soon if we decide that we really need this tool. Have a nice day! :)
